---
Title: "Custom Policy Template Data Source"
Description: |-
    Retrieving a custom policy template's manifest, recipe schema and usage template
---

# Custom Policy Template Data Source

This data source enables users to retrieve a custom policy template's manifest, recipe schema and usage template.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "tanzu-mission-control_custom_policy_template" "template_data" {
  name = "replica-count-range-enforcement"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the custom policy template

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `recipe_schema` (String) JSON encoded OpenAPI schema of the template.
- `recipe_template` (String) JSON encoded OpenAPI template.
- `template_manifest` (String) YAML formatted Kubernetes resource.
